insa.h4401.controller.states

Class DefaultState

  • java.lang.Object
    • insa.h4401.controller.states.DefaultState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputingRouteState, InitState, MapLoadedState, MapSelectState, PlanningLoadedState, PlanningSelectState, SelectionsStates, SwapDeliveriesState

    public abstract class DefaultState
extends java.lang.Object
implements IState
    This class represents the default logic state extended by all other concretes states.
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul
